about.title: About
about.text: Vas3kland was discovered by the vas3k.club community expedition during a visit to Liberland on the Serbia–Croatia border. Founded on openness and respect for facts.

story.title: The discovery story
story.p1: Officially: the expedition was looking for inspiration and identified a new country aligned with community values.
story.p2: Unofficial interpretation: an initiative of community members. Details are in the original thread.
